item.title: Create a Marvel Database with SQL and Javascript - the easy way
item.description: I know, the image above is mostly about DC, but this post is not only about Marvel and Lena Rose did a great job taking this picture. In this post I explain how to create a Marvel Database (or a DC Database). For that, we will query data from Wikipedia and integrate it using Javascript and SQL. We will make a flexible tool that will allow you to create different tables to use in your projects.
